trans-unit.source: Performs data manipulation operations at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时中执行数据操作。

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataManipulator*> property of the root <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此类公开由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataManipulator*>根的属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataManipulator*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Exports the data for every series stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将数据导出为每个系列存储在<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection"></xref>到<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object that contains series data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>包含序列数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Exports data from one or more series to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将数据导出到一个或多个序列中<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> to be exported.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>要导出。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object that contains series data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>包含序列数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Exports data from the specified series to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将数据导出到指定的序列中<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The series to be exported.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的序列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object that contains series data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>包含序列数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Performs custom filtering on the data points in one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>, based on the points in the first series.
trans-unit.target: 执行在中一个或多个数据点上的自定义筛选<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>，基于第一个序列中的点。

trans-unit.source: The filtered <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> objects also store the modified data.
trans-unit.target: 将筛选<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>对象还存储已修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>要筛选。

trans-unit.source: Performs custom filtering on the data points in a series.
trans-unit.target: 执行一系列中的数据点的自定义筛选。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that is filtered also stores the modified data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>筛选的对象还存储已修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that is filtered.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>筛选的对象。

trans-unit.source: Filters one or more series by applying a filtering rule to the first Y-value of the data points in the first series.
trans-unit.target: 通过将筛选规则应用于第一个序列中的数据点的第一个 Y 值筛选一个或多个序列。

trans-unit.source: The filtered <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> objects are used to store the modified data.
trans-unit.target: 将筛选<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>对象用于存储已修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod"></xref> enumeration value that determines the comparison method for the filtering rule.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod"> </xref>枚举值，该值确定筛选规则的比较方法。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod"></xref>, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod"></xref>, and so forth.

trans-unit.source: The value part of the filtering rule that is applied to the first Y-values of data points.
trans-unit.target: 应用于数据点的第一个 Y 值的筛选规则值部分中。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the filtering rule "<6", 6 is the value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在筛选规则"<6"，6 是值。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>要筛选。

trans-unit.source: Filters data points in a series by applying a filtering rule to the first Y-value of each data point.
trans-unit.target: 通过将筛选规则应用于每个数据点的第一个 Y 值筛选序列中的数据点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that is filtered also stores the modified data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>筛选的对象还存储已修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: The value part of the filtering rule that is applied to the first Y-values of data points.
trans-unit.target: 应用于数据点的第一个 Y 值的筛选规则值部分中。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the filtering rule "<6", 6 is the value.

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>筛选的对象。

trans-unit.source: Filters the data points of one or more series, either by removing the specified points or by marking them as empty for the given date/time ranges.
trans-unit.target: 筛选一个或多个系列，通过移除指定的点或标记为给定的日期/时间范围为空的数据点。

trans-unit.source: The filtered <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> objects are used to store the modified data.
trans-unit.target: 将筛选<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>对象用于存储已修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateRangeType"></xref> enumeration value that represents a date/time interval, such as days of the week, days of the month, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateRangeType"> </xref>枚举值，该值表示的日期/时间间隔，例如每周天数、 月和等的天数。

trans-unit.source: Determines the range over which the given elements will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 确定将对其筛选的给定的元素的范围。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the elements within the date/time range designated by the `dateRange` parameter that will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 指定在指定的日期/时间范围内的元素`dateRange`将筛选的参数。

trans-unit.source: Can be a single value, for example, "7"; comma-separated values, for example, "5,6"; a range of values, such as "9-11"; or any variation thereof, such as "5,6,9-11".
trans-unit.target: 可以为单个值，例如，"7";逗号分隔值，例如，"5,6";一系列的值，如"9-11";或其中，例如"5,6,9-11"任何变体。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a custom sort on the data points in one or more series; the sort logic is defined by the `comparer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在一个或多个系列; 在数据点上执行自定义排序通过定义排序逻辑`comparer`参数。

trans-unit.source: Override and implement the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface, perform the comparison(s) and then return `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 重写并实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口、 进行比较，然后返回`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sort order is determined by the return value.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值由确定排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note that if multiple series are sorted, the series must be aligned, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否多个序列进行排序，序列必须对齐，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The two object parameters of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A> method must always be of type <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 两个对象<xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A>的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>必须始终为方法</xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A>的参数

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > All data points, regardless of the series they belong to, are sorted based on the first series; if the position of a data point in the first series changes, all corresponding points in the other series change as well.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 所有数据点，而不考虑它们属于系列根据在第一个序列进行都排序; 如果第一个序列中的数据点的位置发生更改，所有其他序列中的相应点也会发生更改。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and provides the custom sorting logic.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口，并提供自定义排序逻辑。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>来进行排序。

trans-unit.target: 在一个或多个系列中，使用指定的顺序在数据点上执行排序。

trans-unit.target: 排序基于每个数据点的第一个 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Performs a sort on the data points in a series using the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 在使用指定的顺序一系列在数据点上执行排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort is based on the first Y-value of each of the data points.
trans-unit.target: 排序基于每个数据点的第一个 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> enumeration value that determines if the sort is ascending or descending.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data points of one or more series in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 对指定的顺序中的一个或多个序列的数据点进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort can be based on any available data point value.
trans-unit.target: 排序可以基于任何可用的数据点值。

trans-unit.source: This method performs an ascending or descending sort on data points in a series, and is based on the value that is set in the `sortBy` parameter such as "X", "AxisLabel", "Y", "Y1", and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行升序或降序排序数据中一系列点和基于在中设置的值`sortBy`参数，如"X"、"AxisLabel"、"Y"、"Y1"等。

trans-unit.source: Note that if multiple series are sorted, the series must be aligned, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否多个序列进行排序，序列必须对齐，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > All series will be sorted using the specified Y-value from the FIRST listed series; that is, all data points, regardless of the series they belong to, are sorted based on the first series.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 所有序列将使用指定的 Y 值从第一个列出的序列进行都排序; 即，所有数据点，而不考虑它们属于的序列进行都都排序基于第一个序列。

trans-unit.source: To sort points using a custom sort routine, use a different definition of this overloaded method.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序使用的自定义排序例程的点，请使用此重载方法的不同定义。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> enumeration value that determines if the sort is ascending or descending.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"> </xref>枚举值，该值确定是否是升序还是降序排序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the data point values to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示要排序的数据点值。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: "X", "Y", "Y2", "Y3", "AxisLabel", and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值为:"X"、"Y"、"Y2"、"Y3"、"AxisLabel"等。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>来进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Performs a sort on the data points in a series using the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 在使用指定的顺序一系列在数据点上执行排序。

trans-unit.source: The sort can be based on any available data point value.
trans-unit.target: 排序可以基于任何可用的数据点值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> enumeration value that determines if the sort is ascending or descending
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"> </xref>枚举值，该值确定是否是升序还是降序排序

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the data point values to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示要排序的数据点值。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: "X", "Y", "Y2", "Y3", "AxisLabel", and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值为:"X"、"Y"、"Y2"、"Y3"、"AxisLabel"等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>要排序的对象。
